name: MicroDecay
description:
MicroDecay is a puzzle and adventure game ! Craft and recycle your tools to go forward in the game and resolve riddles !

You embody a miniaturized character in a polluted world by the Humans, you goal is to depolluted all the areas in the world !

The Game is in french by the way !
